tool_description: Creates official laboratory test orders in the system with all required clinical and administrative information for proper test execution and billing.

ordering_physician.description: Name or ID of the physician ordering the tests

test_codes.description: Array of laboratory test codes to be ordered

clinical_indication.description: Clinical reason for ordering the tests

collection_date.description: Preferred specimen collection date and time

special_instructions.description: Any special collection or processing instructions

diagnosis_codes.description: ICD-10 diagnosis codes supporting the test orders

error_messages: Invalid patient ID: Patient not found in system. Verify patient is registered.
Invalid physician credentials: Ordering physician not authorized to order laboratory tests.
Invalid test codes: One or more test codes are not valid or available.
Missing clinical justification: Clinical indication must be provided for all test orders.
Invalid urgency level: Urgency must be [routine, urgent, stat].
Invalid collection date: Date must be current or future, properly formatted as ISO 8601.
Authorization required: Some tests require prior authorization before ordering.
usage: Provide patient_id, ordering_physician, test_codes, clinical_indication, and urgency to create a laboratory order. Optionally specify collection_date, special_instructions, and diagnosis_codes.

order_id.description: Unique identifier for the created laboratory order

order_status.description: Current status of the order: pending, active, cancelled

estimated_completion.description: Expected completion date and time for all ordered tests

total_tests.description: Number of tests included in this order
